anya-e0903n4:3_1: mahāvaggasaṁyutte panāvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi dutiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ upaḍḍhasuttaṁ bhagavatā
anya-e0903n4:3_2: kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:4_1: sakkesu bhante sakkare nāma sakyānaṁ nigame āyasmantaṁ ānandattheraṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:4_2: Āyasmā bhante ānandatthero bhagavantaṁ etadavoca “upaḍḍhamidaṁ bhante brahmacariyaṁ yadidaṁ kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā”ti.
anya-e0903n4:4_5: sakalamevidaṁ ānanda brahmacariyaṁ yadidaṁ kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:5_0: Mamaṁ hi ānanda kalyāṇamittaṁ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccanti.
anya-e0903n4:8_1: bojjhaṅgasaṁyutte panāvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi chaṭṭhaṁ saṁgītaṁ kuṇḍaliyasuttaṁ bhagavatā
anya-e0903n4:8_2: kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:9_1: sākete bhante añjanavane migadāye kuṇḍaliyaṁ paribbājakaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:9_2: Kuṇḍaliyo bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā “ahamasmi bho gotama ārāmanissayī parisāvacaro,
anya-e0903n4:9_3: tassa mayhaṁ bho gotama pacchābhattaṁ bhuttapātarāsassa ayamācāro hoti ārāmena ārāmaṁ uyyānena uyyānaṁ anucaṅkamāmi anuvicarāmi,
anya-e0903n4:9_4: so tattha passāmi eke samaṇabrāhmaṇe itivādappamokkhānisaṁsañceva kathaṁ kathante upārambhānisaṁsañca,
anya-e0903n4:9_5: bhavaṁ pana gotamo kimānisaṁso viharatī”ti etaṁ vacanaṁ avoca.
anya-e0903n4:9_6: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “vijjāvimuttiphalānisaṁso kho kuṇḍaliya tathāgato viharatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:11_2: sammāsambuddhena bojjhaṅgasaṁyutte dutiye gilānavagge paṭhamagilānasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:12_1: rājagahe bhante pippaliguhāyaṁ āyasmantaṁ mahākassapattheraṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:12_2: Āyasmā bhante mahākassapatthero pippaliguhāyaṁ viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
anya-e0903n4:12_3: Atha kho bhante bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahākassapo tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0903n4:12_5: nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ mahākassapaṁ etadavoca–
anya-e0903n4:12_8: kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti,
anya-e0903n4:12_10: Na me bhante khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ,
anya-e0903n4:12_11: bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti,
anya-e0903n4:12_13: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “sattime kassapa bojjhaṅgā mayā sammadakkhātā bhāvitā bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya
anya-e0903n4:14_1: tattheva āvuso tatiye udāyivagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi dasamaṁ saṁgītaṁ udāyisuttaṁ bhagavatā
anya-e0903n4:14_2: kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:15_1: sumbhesu bhante setakenāma sumbhānaṁ nigame āyasmantaṁ udāyittheraṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:15_2: Āyasmā bhante udāyitthero bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā “acchariyaṁ bhante,
anya-e0903n4:15_4: yāva bahukatañca me bhante bhagavati pemañca gāravo ca hirī ca ottappañcāti evamādikaṁ vacanaṁ avoca.
anya-e0903n4:15_5: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “sādhu sādhu udāyi eso hi te udāyi maggo paṭiladdho.
anya-e0903n4:18_1: satipaṭṭhānasaṁyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhaka mahātherehi dutiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ satisuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ kārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:19_1: vesāliyaṁ bhante ambapālivane sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “sato bhikkhave bhikkhu vihareyya sampajāno ayaṁ
anya-e0903n4:19_2: vo amhākaṁ anusāsanī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:21_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi catutthaṁ saṁgītaṁ sālasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:22_1: kosalesu bhante sālāyanāma kesalānaṁ brāhmaṇagāme sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “ye te bhikkhave bhikkhū
anya-e0903n4:22_3: te vo bhikkhave bhikkhū catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvanāya samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:24_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi chaṭṭhaṁ saṁgītaṁ sakuṇagghisuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:25_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “bhūtapubbaṁ bhikkhave sakuṇagghi lāpaṁ sakuṇaṁ sahasā ajjhappattā aggahesi.
anya-e0903n4:25_2: Atha kho bhikkhave lāpo sakuṇo sakuṇagghiyā hariyamāno evaṁ paridevasi mayamevamha alakkhikā,
anya-e0903n4:25_5: sacejja mayaṁ gocare careyyāma sake pettike visaye,
anya-e0903n4:25_6: na myāhaṁ sakuṇagghi alaṁ abhavissa yadidaṁ yuddhāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:27_0: Ko pana te lāpa gocaro sako pettiko visayo.
anya-e0903n4:29_0: Ehi kho dāni me sakuṇagghi, ehi kho dāni me sakuṇagghi,
anya-e0903n4:30_0: (Dāruguḷoviya vinivattitvā tasseva leḍḍussa antare paccupādi. Aṭṭhakathā)
anya-e0903n4:31_0: Evañhi taṁ bhikkhave hoti yo agocare carati paravisaye.
anya-e0903n4:32_0: Tasmātiha bhikkhave mā agocare carittha paravisaye.
anya-e0903n4:33_0: Gocare bhikkhave caratha sake pettike visaye.
anya-e0903n4:34_0: Gocare bhikkhave carataṁ sake pettike visaye na lacchati māro otāraṁ, na lacchati māro ārammaṇaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:36_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi dasamaṁ saṁgītaṁ bhikkhunupassayasuttaṁ bhagavatā
anya-e0903n4:36_2: kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:37_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ ānandattheraṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:37_2: Āyasmā bhante ānando yāvattako ahosi bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ kathāsallāpo taṁ sabbaṁ bhagavato ārocesi.
anya-e0903n4:37_5: yohi koci ānanda bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacitto viharati,
anya-e0903n4:37_6: tassetaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ uḷāraṁ pubbenāparaṁ visesaṁ sañjānissatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:39_1: tattheva āvuso dutiye nālandavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi tatiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ cundasuttaṁ
anya-e0903n4:39_2: bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:40_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁyeva ānandattheraṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:40_2: Āyasmā bhante ānandatthero cundena samaṇuddesena saddhiṁ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
anya-e0903n4:40_4: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho bhante āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca “ayaṁ bhante cundo samaṇuddeso evamāha ‘āyasmā bhante sāriputto parinibbuto,
anya-e0903n4:40_6: Api ca me bhante madhurakajāto viya kāyo,
anya-e0903n4:40_8: dhammāpi maṁ nappaṭibhanti ‘āyasmā sāriputto parinibbuto’ti sutvā”ti.
anya-e0903n4:40_9: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “kiṁ nu kho te ānanda sāriputto sīlakkhandhaṁ vā ādāya parinibbuto,
anya-e0903n4:40_13: vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhaṁ vā ādāya parinibbuto”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:42_0: Tasmātihānanda attadīpā viharatha attasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā dhammadīpā dhammasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā.
anya-e0903n4:44_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi pañcamaṁ saṁgītaṁ bāhiyasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:45_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ bāhiyaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:45_2: Āyasmā bhante bāhiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca “sādhu me bhante bhagavā saṁkhittena dhammaṁ desetu,
anya-e0903n4:45_3: yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyya”nti.
anya-e0903n4:45_4: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “tasmātiha tvaṁ bāhiya ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu.
anya-e0903n4:45_6: sīlañca suvisuddhaṁ diṭṭhica ujukā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:48_1: tattheva āvuso tatiye sīlaṭṭhitivagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi dutiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ ciraṭṭhitisuttaṁ
anya-e0903n4:48_2: kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:49_1: pāṭaliputte bhante āyasmantaṁ bhaddaṁ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:49_2: Āyasmā bhante bhaddo sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0903n4:49_3: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca “ko nu kho āvuso ānanda hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0903n4:49_4: yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hoti,
anya-e0903n4:49_5: ko panāvuso ānanda hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0903n4:49_6: yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti.
anya-e0903n4:49_7: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “sādhu sādhu āvuso bhadda,
anya-e0903n4:49_8: bhaddako kho te āvuso bhadda ummaṅgo”ti evamādinā āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:51_0: “Catunnaṁ kho āvuso satipaṭṭhānānaṁ abhāvitattā abahulīkatattā tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hotī” –
anya-e0903n4:53_1: tassāvuso bhagavatā arahato sammāsambuddhassa pāvacanasamudayabhūtāya mahāvaggapāḷiyā satipaṭṭhānasaṁyutte
anya-e0903n4:53_2: sīlaṭṭhitivagge navamaṁ sirivaḍḍhasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:54_1: rājagahe bhante sirivaḍḍhaṁ gahapatiṁ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:54_2: Sirivaḍḍho bhante gahapati ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
anya-e0903n4:54_3: Athakho bhante āyasmā ānando yenasirivaḍḍhassa gahapatissa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0903n4:54_5: Nisajja kho āyasmā ānando sirivaḍḍhaṁ gahapatiṁ etadavoca “kacci te gahapati khamanīyaṁ,
anya-e0903n4:54_7: kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti,
anya-e0903n4:54_11: bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti,
anya-e0903n4:54_13: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “tasmātiha te gahapati evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ ‘kāye kāyānupassī viharissāmi ātāpī
anya-e0903n4:54_14: sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassaṁ. Vedanāsu. Citte.
anya-e0903n4:54_15: Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharissāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa’nti.
anya-e0903n4:54_17: Evaṁ kho āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:57_1: iddhipādasaṁyutte āvuso catutthaṁ moggallānasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:58_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:58_2: Sambahulā bhante bhikkhū heṭṭhāmigāramātupāsāde viharanti uddhatā unnaḷā capalā mukharā vikiṇṇavācā muṭṭhassatino
anya-e0903n4:58_4: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ te bhikkhū saṁvejetvā “kiṁ nu tumhe bhikkhave saṁviggā
anya-e0903n4:58_5: lomahaṭṭhajātā ekamantaṁ ṭhitā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:59_0: Acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho.
anya-e0903n4:62_0: Tumheva kho bhikkhave saṁvejetukāmena moggallānena bhikkhunā pādaṅguṭṭhakena migāramātupāsādo saṅkampito sampakampito sampadhālito.
anya-e0903n4:63_1: katamesaṁ dhammānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā moggallāno bhikkhu evaṁ mahiddhiko evaṁ mahānubhāvo.
anya-e0903n4:66_1: anuruddhasaṁyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi dasamaṁ saṁgītaṁ bāḷhaginānasuttaṁ kattha
anya-e0903n4:66_2: kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:67_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā anuruddhattherena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:67_2: Sambahulā bhante bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ ābādhikaṁ dukkhitaṁ bāḷhagilānaṁ etadavocuṁ “katamenāyasmato
anya-e0903n4:67_3: anuruddhassa vihārena viharato uppannā sārīrikā dukkhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”ti.
anya-e0903n4:67_4: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “catūsu kho me āvuso satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittassa viharato uppannā sārīrikā
anya-e0903n4:67_5: dukkhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”ti evamādinā āyasmatā anuruddhattherena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:70_1: ānāpānasaṁyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi sattamaṁ saṁgītaṁ mahākappinasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:71_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “passatha no tumhe bhikkhave etassa bhikkhuno kāyassa iñjitattaṁ
anya-e0903n4:71_2: vā phanditabbaṁ vā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:73_1: tattheva āvuso dutiyavagge paṭhamaṁ icchānaṅgalasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:74_1: icchānaṅgale bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “sace kho bhikkhave aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṁ puccheyyuṁ
anya-e0903n4:74_2: ‘katame nāvuso vihārena samaṇo gotamo vassāvāsaṁ bahulaṁ vihāsī’ti.
anya-e0903n4:74_3: Evaṁ puṭṭhā tumhe bhikkhave tesaṁ aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ evaṁ byākareyyātha ānāpānassatisamādhinā
anya-e0903n4:74_4: kho āvuso bhagavā vassāvāsaṁ bahulaṁ vihāsī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:77_1: sotāpattisaṁyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi paṭhamaṁ saṁgītaṁ cakkavattirājasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:78_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “kiñcāpi bhikkhave rājā cakkavattī catunnaṁ dīpānaṁ issariyādhipaccaṁ
anya-e0903n4:78_2: rajjaṁ kāretvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati devānaṁ tāvatiṁsānaṁ sahabyataṁ,
anya-e0903n4:78_3: so tattha nandane vane accharāsaṅghaparivuto dibbehi ca pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāreti so catūhi dhammehi asamannāgato,
anya-e0903n4:78_7: aparimutto apāyaduggativinipātā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:80_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi tatiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ dīghāvuupāsakasuttaṁ bhagavatā
anya-e0903n4:80_2: kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:81_1: rājagahe bhante dīghāvuṁ upāsakaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:81_2: Bhagavā bhante dīghāvuṁ upāsakaṁ ābādhikaṁ dukkhitaṁ bāḷhagilānaṁ etadavoca “kacci te dīghāvu khamanīyaṁ,
anya-e0903n4:81_4: kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti,
anya-e0903n4:81_7: na yāpanīyaṁ bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti,
anya-e0903n4:81_9: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “tasmātiha te dīghāvu evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato bhavissāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:82_0: Yānimāni bhante bhagavatā cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni desitāni, saṁvijjante te dhammā mayi–
anya-e0903n4:83_0: Tasmātiha tvaṁ dīghāvu imesu catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu patiṭṭhāya cha vijjābhāgiye dhamme uttari bhāveyyāsi–
anya-e0903n4:84_0: Mā tvaṁ tāta dīghāvu evaṁ manasākāsi.
anya-e0903n4:85_0: Iṅgha tvaṁ tāta dīghāvu yadeva te bhagavā āha, tadeva tvaṁ sādhukaṁ manasikarohi.
anya-e0903n4:89_0: Dīghāvu bhikkhave upāsako pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
anya-e0903n4:91_2: sammāsambuddhena sotāpattisaṁyutte sattamaṁ saṁgītaṁ veḷudvāreyyasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:92_1: kosalesu bhante veḷudvāre nāma kosalānaṁ brāhmaṇa gāme veḷudvāreyyake brāhmaṇagahapatike ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:93_0: Veḷudvāreyyakā bhante brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ “mayaṁ bho gotama evaṁkāmā evaṁchandā
anya-e0903n4:93_3: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjeyyāma,
anya-e0903n4:93_4: tesaṁ no bhavaṁ gotamo amhākaṁ evaṁkāmānaṁ evaṁchandānaṁ evaṁadhippāyānaṁ tathā dammaṁ desetu,
anya-e0903n4:93_6: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjeyyāmā”ti.
anya-e0903n4:93_7: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “attūpanāyikaṁ vo gahapatayo dhammapariyāyaṁ desessāmi,
anya-e0903n4:96_1: tattheva āvuso tatiye saraṇānivagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi paṭhamaṁ saṁgītaṁ paṭhamamahānāmasuttaṁ
anya-e0903n4:96_2: bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:97_1: sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme mahānāmaṁ sakkaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:97_2: Mahānāmo bhante sakko bhagavantaṁ etadavoca “idaṁ bhante kapilavatthu iddhañceva phītañca bāhujaññaṁ ākiṇṇamanussaṁ sambādhabyūhaṁ,
anya-e0903n4:97_3: so khvāhaṁ bhante bhagavantaṁ vā payirupāsitvā manobhāvanīye vā bhikkhū sāyanhasamayaṁ kapilavatthuṁ pavisanto bhantenapi hatthinā samāgacchāmi,
anya-e0903n4:97_8: tassa mayhaṁ bhante tasmiṁ samaye mussateva bhagavantaṁ ārabbha sati,
anya-e0903n4:97_11: tassa mayhaṁ bhante evaṁ hoti imamhi cāhaṁ samaye kālaṁ kareyyaṁ,
anya-e0903n4:97_16: apāpakaṁ te maraṇaṁ bhavissati apāpikā kālaṁ kiriyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:99_1: tattheva āvuso dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi pañcamaṁ saṁgītaṁ dutiyasaraṇānisakkasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha
anya-e0903n4:99_2: kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:100_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme mahānāmaṁyeva sakkaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:101_0: Mahānāmo bhante sakko bhagavantaṁ etadavoca “idha bhante saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato,
anya-e0903n4:101_1: so bhagavatā byākato ‘sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’ti.
anya-e0903n4:101_2: Tatra sudaṁ bhante sambahulā sakkā saṅgamma samāgamma ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti ‘acchariyaṁ vata bho,
anya-e0903n4:102_1: ettha dāni ko na sotāpanno bhavissati,
anya-e0903n4:102_2: yatra hi nāma saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato,
anya-e0903n4:102_3: so bhagavatā byākato ‘sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’ti,
anya-e0903n4:102_4: saraṇāni sakko sikkhāya aparipūrakārī ahosī”ti tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “yo so mahānāma dīgharattaṁ upāsako buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato,
anya-e0903n4:102_7: so kathaṁ vinipātaṁ gaccheyyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:104_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi chaṭṭhaṁ saṁgītaṁ paṭhamaanāthapiṇḍikasuttaṁ kattha
anya-e0903n4:104_2: kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:105_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:106_0: Āyasmā bhbhante sāriputtatthero āyasmatā ānandattherena pacchāsamaṇena saddhiṁ yena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0903n4:106_2: nisajja kho āyasmā sāriputto anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ ābādhikaṁ dukkhitaṁ bāḷhagilānaṁ etadavoca “kacci te gahapati khamanīyaṁ kacci yāpanīyaṁ,
anya-e0903n4:106_13: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “yathā rūpena kho gahapati buddhe appasādena samannāgato assutavā puthujjano
anya-e0903n4:106_14: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ niyaraṁ upapajjati tathārūpo te buddhe appasādo natthi,
anya-e0903n4:106_15: atthi ca kho te gahapati buddhe aveccappasādo ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho…pe…
anya-e0903n4:106_16: bhagavā’ti tañca pana te buddhe aveccappasādaṁ attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyyā”ti
anya-e0903n4:110_0: Adaliddoti taṁ āhu, amoghaṁ tassa jīvitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:115_1: tattheva āvuso puññābhisandavaggo porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi sattamaṁ saṁgītaṁ mahānāmasuttaṁ
anya-e0903n4:115_2: bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:116_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṁ mahānāmaṁ sakkaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:117_0: Mahānāmo bhante sakko bhagavantaṁ etadavoca “kittāvatā nu kho bhante upāsako hotī”ti.
anya-e0903n4:117_1: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “yato kho mahānāma buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato hoti,
anya-e0903n4:117_3: saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gato hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:118_0: Kittāvatā nu kho bhante upāsako hoti.
anya-e0903n4:120_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi navamaṁ saṁgītaṁ kāḷigodhasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ kārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:121_1: sakkesu bhante kāḷigodhaṁ nāma sākiyāniṁ ārabbha “catūhi kho godhe dhammehi samannāgatā ariyasāvikā sotāpannā
anya-e0903n4:121_2: hoti avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:122_0: Lābhā te godhe, suladdhaṁ te godhe, sotāpattiphalaṁ tayā godhe –
anya-e0903n4:124_2: sammāsambuddhena sotāpattisaṁyutte puññābhisandavagge dasamaṁ nandiyasakkasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:125_1: sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme nandiyaṁ sakkaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:125_2: Nandiyo bhante sakko bhagavantaṁ etadavoca “yasseva nu kho bhante ariyasāvakassa cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni sabbena sabbaṁ sabbathāsabbaṁ natthi,
anya-e0903n4:125_3: sveva nu kho bhante ariyasāvako pamādavihārī”ti.
anya-e0903n4:125_4: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “yassa kho nandiya cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni sabbenasabbaṁ sabbathāsabbaṁ natthi,
anya-e0903n4:125_5: tamahaṁ bāhiro puthujjanapakkhe ṭhitoti vadāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:128_1: saccasaṁyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāyakamahātherehi dasamaṁ saṁgītaṁ tiracchānakathāsuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:129_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha mā bhikkhave anekavihitaṁ tiracchānakathaṁ katheyyātha.
anya-e0903n4:129_3: rājakathaṁ corakathaṁ mahāmattakathaṁ senākathaṁ bhayakathaṁ yuddhakathaṁ annakathaṁ pānakathaṁ vatthakathaṁ
anya-e0903n4:131_0: Tasmātiha bhikkhave idaṁ dukkhanti yogo karaṇīyo…pe…
anya-e0903n4:133_1: tattheva āvuso dhammacakkappavattanavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi paṭhamaṁ saṁgītaṁ dhammacakkapavattanasuttaṁ
anya-e0903n4:133_2: bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:134_1: bārāṇasiyaṁ bhante isipatane migadāye pañcavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha “dve me bhikkhave antā pabbajitena nasevitabbā.
anya-e0903n4:134_3: yo cāyaṁ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṁhito,
anya-e0903n4:134_4: yo cāyaṁ attakilamathānuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasaṁhito,
anya-e0903n4:134_5: ete kho bhikkhave ubho ante anupagamma majjhimāpaṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:136_1: tattheva āvuso koṭigāmavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi pañcamaṁ saṁgītaṁ āsavakkhayasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:137_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “jānatohaṁ bhikkhave passato āsavānaṁ khayaṁ vadāmi,
anya-e0903n4:137_3: Kiñca bhikkhave jānato passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti,
anya-e0903n4:137_4: idaṁ dukkhanti bhikkhave jānato passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti,
anya-e0903n4:137_7: ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminīpaṭipadāti jānato passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
anya-e0903n4:137_8: Evaṁ kho bhikkhave jānato evaṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
anya-e0903n4:137_12: ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminīpaṭipadāti yogo karaṇīyo”ti evaṁ kho bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:139_1: tattheva āvuso sīsapāvanavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi paṭhamaṁ saṁgītaṁ sīsapāvanasuttaṁ
anya-e0903n4:139_2: bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:140_1: kosambiyaṁ bhante sīsapāvane sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “taṁ kiṁ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n4:140_2: katamaṁ nukho bahutaraṁ yāni vā mayā parittāni sīsapāpaṇṇāni pāṇinā gahitāni yadidaṁ upari sīsapāvane”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:142_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi pariyosānabhāvena saṁgīto pañcagatipeyyālavagge,
anya-e0903n4:142_2: bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsito.
anya-e0903n4:143_1: vesāliyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “taṁ kiṁ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n4:143_3: yo vāyaṁ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito,
anya-e0903n4:143_4: ayaṁ vā mahāpathavī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsito.
anya-e0903n4:145_0: Vissajjanā – sekkhā ca bhante puthujjanakalyāṇakā ca sikkhanti.
anya-e0903n4:151_0: Vissajjanā – yesaṁ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0903n4:153_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
